item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 9, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:

23. A popular but wrong way to convert a string to uppercase or lowercase (129 points | 146 comments)

30. An Earnest Exploration of Hublot, the Most Polarizing Watch Brand (2023) (12 points | discuss)
